name: Drag The Robot
description:
Drag The Robot

The Robot won't stop moving, So you must drag the box for jumping and speed up the robot. Get to the exit point and there you go.

The Game was made for the:

Trijam #115: The 3 hour game jam

It was made in over 5 hours extend the time limit. It was my first shoot and I loved!

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Made my own PixelArt
